title: On-chain AI Agent Demo: $GMAC Token-Gated Agent with Transaction Fees (Ethereum, BNB Chain, Arbitrum, Avalanche, Polygon, Optimism, Fraxtal)
description: Demo of an on-chain AI agent deployed across Ethereum, BNB Chain, Arbitrum, Avalanche, Polygon, Optimism, and Fraxtal. The agent charges protocol fees on each transaction. Access is token-gated: users must hold $GMAC to use the agent.
